text: New study reveals shocking truth about hospital privatization: worse patient care! 😱🏥 The Lancet Public Health publishes study led by University of Oxford researchers, confirming findings of multiple PSI studies. 🔬👨‍⚖️ Patient care quality decreases after privatization, with staffing levels, patient mix, number of services provided, doctors' workload, and patients' health outcomes all suffering. 💔🚑 What does this mean for the future of healthcare? 🤔
